text: Waking Ned (titled Waking Ned Devine in Australia and North America) is a 1998 British Irish French American comedy movie directed first time director Kirk Jones. It stars Ian Bannen, David Kelly, Susan Lynch, Susan Gilmore, James Nesbitt, Fionnula Flanagan and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1998 comedy movies Category:British comedy movies Category:Irish comedy movies Category:French comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Kirk Jones Category:Movies set in Ireland Category:Movies set in Isle of Man Category:Movies about old age
title: Waking Ned Devine
